about_the_game:
[PET TOWN]

An MR Simulation with Your Own Pet!

[Game Introduction]

PET TOWN is a casual simulation game that offers a unique experience, allowing you to cross between virtual and real worlds with your adorable pets. Switch seamlessly between VR and MR modes as you care for, play with, and bond with your pets. More than just a simulation, PetTown offers a heartfelt connection with your pets, bringing warmth and joy through genuine interaction.

[Intuitive Hand Gesture Controls]

Interact with the UI using only your 'left hand'! Thumbs up to open the menu, thumbs down to close it. Show your palm to reveal the game exit UI.

[Hybrid Mode: Switch Between VR and MR Freely]

Transition to MR mode with a scissors-hand gesture, and return to VR by clenching your fist. In MR mode, bond with your pets in your real-world space, while VR mode immerses you in a virtual environment to share time with your pets.

[Relationship]: Realistic Pet Interactions Touch and pet your pets to engage with them, and observe their expressive emotional responses. Their actions and facial expressions are as lifelike as in the real world.

[Care]: Play with Your Pet! Play fetch, feed, and bathe your pets to strengthen your bond and make them happy!

[Round]: Fun Mini-Games Enjoy a variety of mini-games, such as hurdle jumping and obstacle dodging, to have fun with your pets. These games provide opportunities for you to get even closer to your pets.

[Shop]: Customize Your Pet Buy outfits and accessories for your pet from the shop to give them a unique style, also purchase food to feed your hungry pet!

Create special moments with your pets in PET TOWN.

An adventure that crosses between the real and virtual world is waiting for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest2, 3 (Hand Tracking Only)
  • Additional Notes: Hand Tracking Only: This game exclusively supports hand tracking mode on Meta Quest 2 and Quest 3. Controllers are not supported. The game requires hand tracking capabilities to be enabled on your Meta Quest device.

short_description: PET TOWN is a casual simulation game where you care for and play with your pets in both VR and MR modes. Use hand gestures to interact, play mini-games, and customize your pets with outfits and accessories.
